personal.name: Rishi Sharma
personal.title: Python & C/C++ Developer
personal.tagline: I build clean, efficient, and user-friendly software solutions.

about.description: I am pursuing B.Tech from Gyan Ganga Institute of Science and Technology, Jabalpur (3rd year). Skilled in Python, C, C++, HTML, and passionate about solving problems through technology.

education.institution: Gyan Ganga Institute of Science and Technology

projects.title: Library Management System
projects.description: A comprehensive system to manage book inventory and lending records, built using Python with a user-friendly interface and efficient database management.
projects.longDescription: This project features complete CRUD operations for books and users, automated fine calculations, search and filter functionality, and data persistence using SQLite database.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: This personal portfolio showcasing my skills and projects with modern design, responsive layout, and interactive animations.
projects.longDescription: A fully responsive portfolio website built with modern web technologies, featuring smooth animations, dark/light theme toggle, and optimized performance.

projects.title: Student Grade Calculator
projects.description: A Python application to calculate and manage student grades with statistical analysis and reporting features.
projects.longDescription: Built with Python, this application helps teachers and students track academic performance with grade calculations, GPA computation, and detailed reports.

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.comment: Rishi delivered exceptional work on our Python automation project. His attention to detail and problem-solving skills are remarkable. Highly recommended!

testimonials.name: Michael Chen
testimonials.comment: Working with Rishi was a fantastic experience. He built a robust web application for our startup and delivered ahead of schedule. Great communication throughout!

testimonials.name: Emily Rodriguez
testimonials.comment: Rishi helped streamline our inventory management with a custom solution. Professional, reliable, and always available for questions.

testimonials.name: David Park
testimonials.comment: Outstanding Python skills and clean code structure. Rishi built exactly what we needed for our data processing pipeline.

testimonials.name: Lisa Thompson
testimonials.comment: The website Rishi created for our agency is beautiful and fast. He understood our vision perfectly and brought it to life.

testimonials.name: Alex Kumar
testimonials.comment: Great collaboration on our open source project. Rishi writes clean, maintainable code and is always eager to learn new technologies.

testimonials.name: Jennifer Wong
testimonials.comment: Rishi developed a custom solution that increased our productivity by 40%. Excellent problem-solving skills and delivery.

testimonials.name: Robert Miller
testimonials.comment: Professional, skilled, and easy to work with. Rishi exceeded our expectations on the desktop application project.

testimonials.name: Amanda Foster
testimonials.comment: Exceptional attention to detail and creative problem-solving. The automated reporting system Rishi built saved us hours of manual work.

testimonials.name: James Wilson
testimonials.comment: Solid technical skills and great communication. Delivered the desktop application on time with all requested features.
